# Nomog-Geaya
## Overview
Name: Nomog-Geaya

Gender: m

Rank: Lesser Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Hobgoblins, War, Authority

Titles:

Holy Symbol: Crossed longsword and handaxe

Alignment: LE

Origin of Worship: Goblinoid

Core Worshippers: Hobgoblins

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Longsword (m) or handaxe (m)

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: *+1 mighty cleaving longsword or handaxe*

Domains: Courage\* (CW), Evil, Law, Strength, Tyranny\* (CW), War.

Special Notes:

Description:
